name: T-Buzz
description:
Controls:

UpArrow for jump

DownArrow for gadget

Left/RightArrow for attack depending on direction

Will add WASD soon

T-Rex entered another dimension, which appeared to be Starr Park. He became a lifeguard as Buzz, but sometimes he goes back to his original world to explore some spikes.

Play well known T-Rex Runner with Brawl Stars characters, including Buzz, Colt, Edgar and Crow! Each of them except jumping has attack, gadget and star power ability, which are very similar to their Brawl Stars mechanics. Unlock them all and see with whom you can go the furthest!

Now featuring dark mode! The Sun became a deadly laser. As soon as the lasers hit the ground and start the fire, Jump!!
